name: LaserCats!
description:
LaserCats!

A game where 2 cats need to fight using "ONLY ONE" attack button to shoot a laser.

CONTROLS:

Shoot Laser!: SPACE (Yes only one attack button and two players😉) 

Grey Cat Walking: Left and Right Arrow Keys

Grey Cat Jumping: Up Arrow Key

Grey Cat Crouching: Down Arrow Key

Orange Cat Walking: 'A' and 'D' Keys

Orange Cat Jumping: 'W' Key

Orange Cat Crouching: 'S' Key

Pause Game: ESC
